meanings.sent1: The antiauthoritarian group protested peacefully against the strict rules.
meanings.sent2: She has an antiauthoritarian attitude towards strict regulations.
meanings.sent3: The antiauthoritarian cat refused to obey the command to stay off the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her antiauthoritarian spirit soared like a rebellious bird against the rules.
meanings.sent5: The antiauthoritarian stance of the students was evident in their peaceful demonstration.

meanings.definition: A person who opposes or resists authority.
meanings.sent1: The antiauthoritarian stood up against the unjust ruler.
meanings.sent2: She became an antiauthoritarian after witnessing the abuse of power.
meanings.sent3: The antiauthoritarian joked that even the pigeons in the park seemed to have more authority.
meanings.sent4: In the meeting, he was the lone antiauthoritarian voice in a sea of conformity.
meanings.sent5: The antiauthoritarian's presence was like a refreshing breeze in the stifling room full of rules.

meanings.definition: A movement or ideology that rejects authoritarianism.
meanings.sent1: The antiauthoritarian gained momentum among the youth seeking freedom.
meanings.sent2: They joined the antiauthoritarian movement to promote equality and democracy.
meanings.sent3: The antiauthoritarian potluck party humorously had no assigned seating.
meanings.sent4: The antiauthoritarian ideology bloomed like a colorful garden in the minds of the people.
meanings.sent5: The antiauthoritarian movement painted a vivid picture of a world without oppressive rulers.
